**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 134 2.0 **Prerequisites** [Untamed Form](/Feats.aspx?ID=4713); [Dragon Shape](/Feats.aspx?ID=4749), [Elemental Shape](/Feats.aspx?ID=4741), [Plant Shape](/Feats.aspx?ID=4744), or [Soaring Shape](/Feats.aspx?ID=4739) **Trigger** varies --- You transform reflexively when in danger. You cast [_untamed form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1861) to transform into one shape granted by one of the prerequisite feats you have, depending on the trigger. Your shape’s resistances and weaknesses apply against the triggering damage.
  • **Trigger** You fall 10 feet or more; **Effect** Choose a shape from [_aerial form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1437).
  • **Trigger** You take bludgeoning or [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126) damage; **Effect** Choose a shape from [_dragon form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1502) that resists the triggering damage.
  • **Trigger** You take fire damage; **Effect** Choose a fire elemental shape from [_elemental form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1510).
  • **Trigger** You take poison damage; **Effect** Choose a shape from [_plant form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1637).
name: Reactive Transformation
prerequisite: Untamed Form; Dragon Shape, Elemental Shape, Plant Shape, or Soaring Shape
